column4: When I create a symbolic link in my home folder, a corresponding icon appears on my desktop. How can I prevent this?
Using gconf-editor go to apps>nautilus>desktop and uncheck the "home folder visible" box.
I don't see such a setting (I am using 10.10), there are computer_icon_visible, home_icon_visible, trash_icon_visible, and volumes_visible
the only one checked is vos
